message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1350000.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price would be a fair reflection of its value, considering the market conditions and my budget constraints.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective on the pricing and I respect your budget constraints. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to consider your offer. However, I must maintain a certain level of profitability for our business. Therefore, I propose a counteroffer of $1275000 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. I believe this price is fair, considering the market value and our previous discussions.
